item.title: Made-to-Measure modelling
item.description: As a new Flatiron Research Fellow who stared a few weeks ago, most of my time here so far has been taken up with getting myself set up in a new institute, and a new country. But, Iâ€™ve also had time to continue some of my thesis work from a few years ago now, which involves using the Made-to-Measure (M2M; Syer & Tremaine 1996) technique to tailor galaxy simulations to match data.
